paymentInstructions.title: Payment Instructions
paymentInstructions.summary: Payments are automatically settled every day at 08:00 UTC time. Transfers to your designated payout address are processed within four hours after settlement. Payments occur once per day and are irreversible.

items.label: For Pool Miners:
items.value: Earnings are based on submitted shares and are paid daily according to the pool's settlement rules.

items.label: For Solo Miners:
items.value: Payouts are made only when a block is successfully found and confirmed. No earnings are generated without a block.

items.label: Important:
items.value: Before setting your payout address, please carefully verify that it is correct and valid. Once payments are sent, they cannot be modified, canceled, or recovered.

questions.a: Earnings are calculated in real-time and settled daily based on confirmed block rewards.

questions.q: What happens if I change my payout address?
questions.a: Changes to your payout address are effective immediately. However, to ensure security, frequent changes may trigger additional verification.

questions.q: What is the minimum payout amount?
questions.a: There is no minimum payout limit. Once settlement is completed, payments are made automatically regardless of the amount.

questions.q: What if my mining device goes offline?
questions.a: If your miner goes offline, it will stop submitting shares. No earnings will be accumulated until the miner reconnects and resumes mining.

questions.q: Can I mine with multiple devices using the same account?
questions.a: Yes, you can connect multiple mining devices to the same account to increase your hashrate and potential rewards.

questions.q: How long does it take for a block reward to be confirmed?
questions.a: Block confirmations typically require a certain number of network confirmations. Rewards are credited once a block is fully confirmed by the blockchain network.
